game
Class GameGraph

java.lang.Object
  game.GameGraph
Direct Known Subclasses:
Tree
public class GameGraph
extends java.lang.Object

The class represents an (undirected) graph. The nodes are numbered and called with integers beginning with zero. The edges are represented by a BooleanMatrix and an adjazenzlist stored by a HashMap where every Node has a list with its neighbours. For creating a new #Game the GameGraph is needed.

Author:
Irene Thesing

Constructor Summary
GameGraph(int knots)
          Creates a new graph with the given number of nodes and no edges.

          Creates a new graph with the given number of nodes, all given connections in the adjazenz lists are taken in both directions.

Constructor Detail

GameGraph

public GameGraph(int knots)
Creates a new graph with the given number of nodes and no edges.

Parameters:
knots - number of nodes for the graph.

GameGraph

public GameGraph(int knots,
                 boolean[][] connect)
Creates a new GameGraph with the given count of knots and the connections given by the matrix displayed in connect. The matrix must have the dimension knots x knots.

Parameters:
knots - knots of the graph.
connect - adjazenzmatrix of the edges of the graph.

GameGraph

public GameGraph(int knots,
                 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer>> adjlists2)
Creates a new graph with the given number of nodes, all given connections in the adjazenz lists are taken in both directions. Initializes all states with false.

Parameters:
knots - number of nodes.
adjlists2 - adjazenz lists for the connections in the graph.
Method Detail

getNeighbours

public java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> getNeighbours(int i)
Returns the direct neighbours of a node in the graph. That are all nodes which have an edge to the given node.

Parameters:
i - number of the node.
Returns:
list of numbers of neighbours of the given node i.

getCountKnots

public int getCountKnots()
Returns the number of Nodes in the graph.

Returns:
the number of knots in the graph.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object

setBmConnections

public void setBmConnections(BooleanMatrix bmConnections)
Sets up edges between the nodes in the graph corresponding to the given matrix and calculates the corresponding adjazenzlist.

Parameters:
bmConnections - the adjazenzmatrix.

getBmConnections

public BooleanMatrix getBmConnections()
Returns the adjazenzmatrix of the graph. In this form they it can be used for many calculations.

Returns:
the edges of the graph, represented in a matrix.
